name: We Are All Ants (plumthumbs)
description:
This is my first title using the Godot engine, and in fact my first game coded from start to finish - it's very much a conceptual demo, created for Godot Wild Jam #22

You join an ant colony as a worker ant, moving seeds from one storage hole to another.

Is there more out there?

Due to time constraints, this project does not contain sound, and there are flaws to iron out.  However, for a first project I'm happy, and I hope you can kind of see the direction I was trying to take this in!  Thank you :)
